item.title: Keycloak
item.description: Context linkDescription linkKeycloak is an open source identity and access management platform that provides authentication, authorization, and security features for applications and services. It allows users to authenticate with different protocols such as OpenID Connect, OAuth 2.0, and SAML, and provides user, role, and group management features. Keycloak can be used as a standalone identity server or integrated into Java, Node.js, and other platforms. Features linkKeycloak provides a range of features, including:
